dashboard.label: Crime Prediction Model Per LSOA using Decision Tree Regressor Algorithm

search.query: | inputlookup LSOA_Size.csv | rename lsoa as Codes | append [| inputlookup Total_Notifiable_Offences.csv ] | append [| inputlookup aged_44.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_15.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_29.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_64.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_65plus.csv ] | append [| inputlookup all_ages.csv ] | append [| inputlookup child_poverty_percent.csv ] | append [| inputlookup happiness_coefficient.csv ] | append [| inputlookup household_income.csv | rename Code as Codes ] | append [| inputlookup school_absence.csv] | stats values(*) as * by Codes | where isnotnull(size) | eval Name=coalesce(Name,Names) | fields - Names *_2012 Codes| apply predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_decisiontreeregressor_FieldSelector_0 | apply "predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_decisiontreeregressor" | `regressionstatistics("total_notifiable_offences_now", "predicted(total_notifiable_offences_now)")` | fields rSquared

| inputlookup LSOA_Size.csv | rename lsoa as Codes | append [| inputlookup Total_Notifiable_Offences.csv ] | append [| inputlookup aged_44.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_15.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_29.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_64.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_65plus.csv ] | append [| inputlookup all_ages.csv ] | append [| inputlookup child_poverty_percent.csv ] | append [| inputlookup happiness_coefficient.csv ] | append [| inputlookup household_income.csv | rename Code as Codes ] | append [| inputlookup school_absence.csv] | stats values(*) as * by Codes | where isnotnull(size) | eval Name=coalesce(Name,Names) | fields - Names *_2012 Codes| apply predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_decisiontreeregressor_FieldSelector_0 | apply "predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_decisiontreeregressor" | `regressionstatistics("total_notifiable_offences_now", "predicted(total_notifiable_offences_now)")` | fields RMSE

| summary "predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_decisiontreeregressor" limit=10 | rename "Decision Tree Summary" as Decision_Tree_Summary | rex field=Decision_Tree_Summary ".*count\:(?<count>[\d]+)" | rex field=Decision_Tree_Summary ".*split\:(?<feature>[\w]+)" | rex field=Decision_Tree_Summary ".*value\:(?<value>[\d]+)" | rex field=Decision_Tree_Summary ".*impurity\:(?<impurity>[\d]+)" | search feature!="N" | stats sum(impurity) as total_impurity sum(value) as total_value sum(count) as total_count by feature | fields feature total_value | sort - total_value limit=10

| inputlookup LSOA_Size.csv | rename lsoa as Codes | append [| inputlookup Total_Notifiable_Offences.csv ] | append [| inputlookup aged_44.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_15.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_29.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_64.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_65plus.csv ] | append [| inputlookup all_ages.csv ] | append [| inputlookup child_poverty_percent.csv ] | append [| inputlookup happiness_coefficient.csv ] | append [| inputlookup household_income.csv | rename Code as Codes ] | append [| inputlookup school_absence.csv] | stats values(*) as * by Codes | where isnotnull(size) | eval Name=coalesce(Name,Names) | fields - Names *_2012 | apply predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_decisiontreeregressor_FieldSelector_0 | apply "predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_decisiontreeregressor" | table _time, "total_notifiable_offences_now", "predicted(total_notifiable_offences_now)"
